title: Rioters + Players VS Doom Bots. Friday 21/10 @6PM PST on NA server
body:
We moved these community games to Fri 28th so everyone (including us :P) can watch worlds on Fri 21st.

Go here for new remake thread. Apologies!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/qRZjx39B-rioters-players-vs-doom-bots-friday-2810-6pm-pst-on-na-server

replies.body: https://media.giphy.com/media/HCTfYH2Xk5yw/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Terra,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iOJA33tF,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-10-20T23:59:43.427+0000)
>
> Welp, only one thing to do in such dark times... SUMMONER THE BARD
> 
> {{champion:432}} 
> _chime noises intensify_

I went bard at lvl 100 first go about, dw you will carry and definitely will not die a lot and take a serious look at life choices you've made
Why have Brand disabled for doom bots?

I think it's because he would be too good for the game mode.

The bots group as 5 to push one tower then they are in the perfect spot for brand. 

Brand is like
 {{champion:63}} *flash-W-E-Q-R dies...*(or he skips Q)
{{champion:157}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:32}} * DOOSH DOOSH DOOSH...*
{{champion:63}} (in his dying breath)  Wait for it... *passive x5*

**PENTA KILL!!!**

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 
*claps for himself*
https://youtu.be/NsoHGsER_ME
Ironically he's one of the doom bots. Fought him, a row of pillars, lovely thing.
https://68.media.tumblr.com/dafc3258b78fe858edeeaa289b33e741/tumblr_inline_o590cdKfmM1tuzlcn_540.png
can i 1v1 the rioter who nerfed shen
Looks like I can't ban Bard this time :^)
You. Don't encourage them. >_<

Lawl :)
If you give me a spot I won't ban bard :)
But you couldn't ban champions on pbe O_o
Ayyyye  I miss hearing about events like this
Yes, this is my chance to get noticed by L4T3NCY senpai!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

When all seemed lost, six Rioters rose above the darkness, to challenge the god of chaos and despair himself...
Teemo.
Will they be able to rid the world of this horrifying evil?
Or will they, like so many others, become...
Doomed!
Wait, I don't understand?

> [{quoted}](name=KillerBoss V2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iOJA33tF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-20T23:52:46.924+0000)
>
> Wait, I don't understand?

HE'S TOO POWERFUL

I have a dream, where Rioters actually answer all questions instead of ignoring them.

Why is brand disabled from Doom Bots? Was he too op on the PBE that he had to be removed? Or a bug?

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iOJA33tF,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-10-21T00:46:40.193+0000)
>
> I have a dream, where Rioters actually answer all questions instead of ignoring them.
> 
> Why is brand disabled from Doom Bots? Was he too op on the PBE that he had to be removed? Or a bug?

I believe he was way too OP.
https://66.media.tumblr.com/7338308a77f82fa876c7543c7ff52bee/tumblr_n8im3xMC6A1rkmfm6o1_400.gif

You should have deleted teemo when you had the chance.

Guess I need to get Annie Bot and Draven Bot to help me show who the real top bots are in town
20 mins left right?
I stayed up 24 hours....
Played in it last time where they did nexus siege it's fun playing with them
I'm down! Would love to play with Rioters!
Sorry if i got my time transfer wrong but isn't it 6:30 PST already? .-.
It's 10:30 in the morning PST. You've got over 7 hours to go.
faqqqqq

THE TIME HAS COME (In apple time)
(Unless i messed up time zone transfer big time)
BUT NEVERTHE LESS
THE TIME HAS COMEE!!!
Yeah, you messed up big time.
ITS ALMOST TIME D:
THE WAITING D::::: IT HURTS!
NOOOO WHY DID YOU HAVE TO DO THIS DURING MY FOOTBALL GAME?!?!?
Do we have to sign up here or how do we join in?
Let's go! We can stop the Teemoing!
Try anivia. She is really *cool* in this fiery hell.

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iOJA33tF,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-20T23:48:53.008+0000)

Can i play to?

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
can we have this recorded or streamed somewhere with y'alls commentary? Just for those of us who have work, college or other things so we cant see the matches.
Can't wait! Hope you don't mind playing with someone really low elo-like, really, really low elo.

I want to play with the Rioters so badly .... but because there's 100,000 other people trying join up with them, I don't stand a chance. Still, one could dream right?

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Oooo hope I get to play
7th

Guys.. what's up with ARAM?
**Will it ever get TRULY random?**
C'mon, grow a pair and just stop dodging this topic for 5 years.
